{"id":927350385,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1680542571,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/927350385/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Convert an Array Into a 2D Array With Conditions","memory":"43.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> findMatrix(int[] nums) {\n        HashMap<Integer,Integer> map=new HashMap<>();\n        HashSet<Integer> set=new HashSet<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            map.put(nums[i],map.getOrDefault(nums[i],0)+1);\n            set.add(nums[i]);\n        }\n        List<List<Integer>> ans=new ArrayList<>();\n        while(map.size()!=0){\n            List<Integer> curr=new ArrayList<>();\n            for(int ele:set){\n                if(map.containsKey(ele)){\n                    int count=map.get(ele);\n                    curr.add(ele);\n                    if(count==1){\n                        map.remove(ele);\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        map.put(ele,count-1);\n                    } \n                }  \n            }\n            ans.add(curr);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"convert-an-array-into-a-2d-array-with-conditions","has_notes":false}
